ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: Highhold definitely has named orcs.  They give shiny brass halberds and shiny brass idols.  I know, I ve been there for about two weeks! Valacian - 20th Level
ygData.messageBody:
Highhold definitely has named orcs. They give shiny brass halberds and shiny brass idols. I know, I've been there for about two weeks!

Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Trubiani [SMTP:u1607755@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 12:30 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components

From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>

I doubt it was Highhold pass.. I've never seen a named orc there, and lvl 15
is pretty low for HH.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Valacian <abryson@...>
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 1:47 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components


>Named Orc in Kithicor? You probably mean Highhold Pass.:) I haven't ever
seen a named orc in Kithicor.
>
>Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>

>From: Shadowwalker [SMTP:Shadowwalker@...]

>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components

>Forest. He was about level 15.
>
>-Shadowwalker
>
